name: Air Hockey Tournament - Soccer Game
description:
Choose your team from 32 national teams and win the world tournament.

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive air hockey soccer game.

Suitable for all ages and enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !

■Game center support:
Compare your best top score with others in the world.

■Social sharing:
Share your new score and challenge with your friends.
